education.degree: Diploma in Web Development and Internet Applications

work_experience.title: Web Developer Intern
project_details: Developed and deployed a reusable JavaScript/jQuery Table of Contents plugin integrated into enterprise knowledge bases, improving navigation speed and reducing bounce rate by 42%.
Improved SEO performance and accessibility by addressing Lighthouse audit findings, raising performance and accessibility scores to consistently exceed 90+ benchmarks.
Developed an internal employee engagement microsite using PHP, REST APIs, and Bootstrap, driving a 50% increase in participation and enabling modular content reuse across departments.
Resolved Node.js environment mismatch issues in CI/CD pipeline, reducing build and deployment failures by 80% and improving reliability.
Contributed to full-stack development by integrating RESTful services with frontend components, focusing on scalability, performance, and secure coding practices.

Collaborated with globally distributed teams in Agile sprints, participating in backlog grooming, peer code reviews, and CI/CD workflows, reinforcing best practices for maintainability and cross-functional delivery.
Created and improved UI/UX designs using Figma, Adobe Photoshop, and Illustrator, enhancing the visual identity of internal sites.

Leadership.title: Capstone Project Developer
achievements: Delivered a production-ready client website with custom design and responsive UI using Laravel and Livewire.
Collaborated with client to gather requirements, iterate on features, and deploy final solution.

projects.name: PLAB2 Practice Platform
projects.description: Real-time collaborative platform for medical exam preparation with role-based practice sessions.
project_details: Built a real-time collaborative platform for PLAB 2 exam preparation, enabling Doctor, Patient, and Observer roles in live sessions.
Implemented session features including timed consultations, randomized clinical cases, and structured feedback workflows.
Developed secure user registration and authentication with JWT-based Spring Security.
Created role-based access control system ensuring protected endpoints and controlled access for doctors, patients, and observers.
Integrated feedback dashboards where users can track history of received and given feedback.
Designed and deployed modular Spring Boot RESTful microservices with 25+ API endpoints.
Implemented WebSockets (STOMP) for real-time synchronization across distributed users.
Applied password encryption with BCrypt and CORS configuration for secure frontend integration.
Optimized for scalability with PostgreSQL persistence, Flyway migrations, and Dockerized deployments.
Delivered CI/CD-ready configuration, enabling fast deployments and reliable cloud delivery.
Deployed backend on Render and frontend on Vercel, connected via custom domain plab2practice.com.
Developed responsive, accessible frontend with React, TypeScript, Material-UI, and Tailwind CSS.
Embedded WCAG-compliant accessibility patterns ensuring compatibility with diverse devices.
Implemented personal dashboard for users to manage practice sessions and feedback history.
Built admin functionality for case management and session oversight.
Enabled scalable support for 500+ active users in cloud-ready environments.
Collaborated in Agile workflows to deliver features iteratively and ensure maintainability.
Enhanced reliability with Docker Compose for local database setup and consistent dev/test environments.
Established structured session lifecycle: create, join via code, start, end, and feedback collection.
Documented clear API endpoints for authentication, session management, and feedback submission.

projects.name: Interview Coach AI
projects.description: MERN stack app generating tailored interview questions with pinning and explanation features.
project_details: Built a cloud-native full-stack platform for AI-powered interview preparation using React 19 + TailwindCSS frontend and Node.js/Express + MongoDB backend.
Integrated Googleâ€™s Gemini AI API to generate personalized technical and behavioral interview questions with detailed explanations.
Implemented secure authentication with JWT, Google OAuth, and bcrypt, including password reset workflows and compliance-ready data handling.
Developed modal-based Forgot Password flow entirely within the login/signup UI, enhancing user experience.
Created a modern, responsive, mobile-friendly interface with smooth animations powered by Framer Motion and styled with TailwindCSS.
Added note-taking, question pinning, and session management features to allow candidates to organize preparation effectively.
Designed centralized dashboard for managing multiple interview sessions and viewing preparation progress.
Enabled profile customization with image upload via Multer and secured file handling.
Implemented RESTful API endpoints for authentication, session management, AI question generation, and question management.
Built backend with structured MVC architecture (controllers, models, routes, middlewares) for maintainability.
Added Nodemailer-based email integration for password reset and user communication.
Enhanced reliability and cloud readiness by adding unit and integration testing, CI/CD pipelines, and containerized configs.
Configured CORS policies and JWT middleware for secure cross-origin API usage.
Optimized application performance with Vite build tool and React Hot Toast for notifications.
Ensured accessibility and consistency across devices with responsive UI and WCAG-aligned patterns.

projects.name: GeekGoose Blog
projects.description: Blog platform built with Laravel Livewire, later repurposed for food blogging.
achievements: Implemented authentication, likes, comments, and admin panel.
Deployed with SEO optimization and analytics tracking.

projects.name: Restaurant Review Management System
projects.description: Full-stack review platform with .NET backend and React frontend.
achievements: Built with ASP.NET Core MVC + React, ensuring fast load performance with SSR.
Developed modular backend in C# with validation, error handling, and controller routing.
Implemented dynamic forms in React Hooks and Bootstrap 5.

projects.name: Student Registration System
projects.description: ASP.NET Razor Pages project with validation and average grade calculation.
